title: Die Sabbathi 19. Junii 1647. The Lords and Commons in Parliament having well accepted the obedience and readinesse of those officers and souldiers who have compiled with their orders, have ordered and ordained, and by authority aforesaid doe order and ordaine, that all and every the said officers and souldiers aforesaid, shall be freed, ...
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publicationStmtPublisher: printed for John Wright at the Kings Head in the Old Bayley,
